import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import Contact from '../../components/Contact/Contact'; import List from '../../components/List/List'; import "./Products.scss"; const Products = () => { // categoryId includes our string object id due to the react-router-dom const categoryId = parseInt(useParams().id); const [maxPrice, setMaxPrice] = useState(500); const [sort, setSort] = useState(null); return (

setSort("asc")}/>
setSort("desc")}/>
